name: Glass Man
description:
A short but sweet 2D platformer. Run and jump through levels as Glass Man, on a quest to defeat the evil Brick Man. Features 6 hidden collectables, which unlock new content once found.

Controls:

  • A or Left Arrow Key to go Left
  • D or Right Arrow Key to go Right
  • Space to jump, twice to double jump
  • R to restart level

If you have any issues, please email Scalar-Games@protonmail.com
